entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
